headline: How EPAM’s Expanded Oracle Partnership and New Fan Experiences Could Shape Future Cloud Ambitions (EPAM)
summary: EPAM Systems recently announced an expanded partnership with Oracle to help clients across healthcare, life sciences, financial services, and insurance integrate Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and AI services into their cloud strategies, while also collaborating with BOSS to launch an immersive motorsport fan experience powered by Apple Vision Pro at select global locations. These initiatives spotlight EPAM's expertise in cloud integration and experiential digital solutions, underscoring its...
